setting.label: Trigger Access Key
setting.name: cron_key
setting.description: Used to prevent unauthorized running of the task scheduler.

setting.label: Trigger Interval
setting.name: cron_interval
setting.description: The minimum time between running tasks, in seconds.

setting.label: Concurrent Processes
setting.name: cron_processes
setting.description: The maximum number of concurrent processes running tasks that are allowed.

setting.label: Tasks Run per Request
setting.name: cron_count
setting.description: The maximum number of tasks that are run during each request. If a task is determined to have done nothing, it may not count towards this number.

setting.label: Time per Request
setting.name: cron_time
setting.description: The maximum time allowed per request. This number will be automatically scaled if ini_get() can read max_execution_time from php.ini.

setting.label: Process Timeout
setting.name: cron_timeout
setting.description: The maximum time before a task is considered to have died. The task will then be reset and freed to execute again.

setting.label: Concurrent Jobs
setting.name: cron_jobs
setting.description: The maximum number of concurrently running jobs. This setting is limited by "Concurrent Processes"

setting.label: Javascript Enable
setting.name: cron_javascript
setting.description: Cron job auto call when user go to site
